Title: Relates to prohibiting boards of elections from entering into certain contracts with entities that have made any political campaign donations of any amount in the last ten years
Summary: Relates to prohibiting boards of elections from entering into contracts for certain services related to the conduct of elections with entities that have made any political campaign donations of any amount in the last ten years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to prohibiting boards of elections from entering into certain contracts with entities that have made any political campaign donations of any amount in the last ten years
